structure.unit: B ADMISSION OF AN INDIVIDUAL WITH AN INTELLECTUAL DISABILITY

law.catch_line: Time of preliminary and final hearings.

text.section: The preliminary hearing shall be held not later than fifteen (15) days, excluding weekends and holidays, from the date of the filing of the petition.
The final hearing shall be held within twenty (20) days of the date of the preliminary hearing or within thirty (30) days of the date of filing of the petition if the preliminary hearing is waived.

law.history: Created 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 147, sec. 14, effective July 13, 1990.
